details: The Saur Sujala Yojana is to set up solar irrigation pumps for the irrigation needs of the farmers. The scheme has been started on November 01, 2016, with the aim of empowering the farmers by providing irrigation pumps to the farmers at subsidized rates.

criteria: Small/medium/large-scale farmers are eligible to apply for this scheme.
The farmer should be a resident of Chhattisgarh State.

steps: Click on "Saur Sujala Yojana Online Apply".
Provide the bank details and Submit.

documents_required: Agricultural land and water source (borewell, well, river/stream etc.) in his own name.
Khasra/area of land and attested map of the workplace.
